SA11bsa041_u:2_1: bhadanto māṃ samanvāharatu / ahamevaṃnāmā anādisaṃsārāt prabhṛtipratyutpannaparyantaṃ rāga-dveṣa-mohavaśāt kāyavāṅmanasā daśākuśalāni kṛtavān,
SA11bsa041_u:2_2: pañcānantaryāṇi, pañca tatsabhāgāni, prātimokṣasaṃvaravirodhaḥ, bodhisattvaśikṣāvirodhaḥ, guhyamantra-samayādi-virodhaḥ,
SA11bsa041_u:2_4: saṃsārāpāyahetubhūtāśca ye ke 'pi āpattidoṣarāśayaḥ (santi) tān sarvān guruvajradharādīnāṃ,
SA11bsa041_u:2_7: āviṣkaromi, na praticchādayāmi / āviṣkṛtena mama sparśavihāro bhavati,
SA11bsa041_u:4_0: prathamasaṃyojanavidhiḥ- evannāmāhaṃ anādisaṃsārāt prabhṛti kleśabāhulyāt pramādādivaśād vā doṣāpattirāśibahulaḥ,
SA11bsa041_u:4_2: ato 'nugṛhyatām iti / ante āpattita uddhṛto 'smītyatīva kṛtajño 'smīti dharmānurupakāryam anumodaye iti vadet /
SA11bsa041_u:6_0: tenaiva bhāratīyopādhyāyena bhoṭīyalokacakṣuṣā bhikṣu-jayaśīlena ca anūdya nirṇītaḥ /
